Profile

Currently

Assistant Professor (Maître de Conférences) at the RST department of Institut Mines-Télécom/Télécom SudParis, Université Paris-Saclay

In charge of the Risk Assessment and Attack Detection course in the Networks and Systems Security major

qualified for Ass. Professorship (MCF) under CNU requirements (#15227240851)

Education

  • 2012 Ph.D in Web application security, NAIST
  • 2008 Specialized Master (MS) in networks and information security, ESIEA
  • 2007 Master in IT engineering, ESIEA
